mapper.select: SELECT favorite_index, user_no, kind, kind_no, DATE_FORMAT(regist_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') regist_date FROM members_favorite WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY favorite_index DESC LIMIT 100;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members_favorite ( user_no, kind, kind_no, regist_date ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{kind}, #{kindNo}, NOW() );
